properties.name: webclient.basePath
properties.description: The base URL to attempt to connect to for REST services if the REST clients are enabled. Should be of the form [host](:[port]).

properties.name: app.height
properties.description: Default height (in pixels) the main window will use.

properties.name: app.width
properties.description: Default width (in pixels) the main window will use.

properties.name: app.baseTitle
properties.description: Default Title Bar entry for the application (i.e. Coda Calibration)

properties.name: app.debug
properties.description: Flag for enabling additional Application level debugging functionality. This is not intended to affect logging levels or globally enable/disable debugging but rather to turn on additional hooks, stack tracing, etc that cross-cut the application. In general this should be left at the default value of false.
